text: The Bangladesh Open is a golf tournament on the Asian Tour. The inaugural tournament was played from 27–30 May 2015 at Kurmitola Golf Club, in Dhaka, Bangladesh. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" !Year!!Winner!!Country!!Score!!To par!!Margin of victory!!Runner(s)-up |- ! colspan=7|Bangabandhu Cup Golf Open |- | 2019 || Sadom Kaewkanjana || || align=center|265 || align=center|−19 || 1 stroke || Ajeetesh Sandhu |- ! colspan=7|AB Bank Bangladesh Open |- | 2018 || Malcolm Kokocinski || || align=center|270 || align=center|−14 || 3 strokes || Ben Campbell Jack Harrison |- ! colspan=7|Bashundhara Bangladesh Open |- | 2017 || Jazz Janewattananond || || align=center|267 || align=center|−17 || 4 strokes || Siddikur Rahman |- | 2016 || Thitiphun Chuayprakong || || align=center|263 || align=center|−21 || 2 strokes || Sutijet Kooratanapisan |- | 2015 || Mardan Mamat || || align=center|270 || align=center|−14 || 2 strokes || Khalin Joshi Lee Soo-min |} ==References== ==External links== *Coverage on the Asian Tour's official site Category:Asian Tour events Category:Golf tournaments in Bangladesh Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Bangladesh
title: Bangladesh Open
